artifacts.label: Red Box
artifacts.blurb: This vibrant red square represents the foundation of our design system. It stands as a bold statement of primary color and visual hierarchy.

artifacts.label: Blue Box
artifacts.blurb: The calming blue rectangle embodies trust and stability in our interface. It serves as a secondary element that balances the visual weight of the composition.

artifacts.label: Green Box
artifacts.blurb: This fresh green element symbolizes growth and harmony within the design. It completes the color triad and brings natural balance to the overall layout.
